text: Meola is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Antonio Meola (born 1990), Italian footballer *Edgardo di Meola (1950–2005), Argentine footballer *Eric Meola (born 1946), American photographer *Massimo Meola (born 1953), Italian footballer *Mike Meola (1905–1976), American baseball player *Tony Meola (born 1969), American soccer player ==See also== *Al Di Meola (born 1954), American musician *Meola Glacier, a glacier of Uttarakhand, India Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Meola
